pr_title: FoliagePlacer mapping and doc, Tree mapping, and a lot of misc feature mapping

timeline.message: a whole lot of feature mappings

timeline.bodyText: Not really, this is mutableCopy as the Mutable subclass does not have an implementation that returns itself.
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: I propose renaming such setOffset to move

timeline.bodyText: Why are you commenting on param 2 than the method itself? also @param tags should be replaced by comments on individual parameter themselves.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,11 +6,55 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4647 net/minecraft/world/gen/foliage/FoliagePlacer

+		ARG 2 baseHeight
+			COMMENT This method is used to ensure that a tree can place foliage when it generates.

+			COMMENT @param baseHeight the height of the hull tree
